text: Bassel al-Assad was a Syrian army general and the oldest son of Hafez al-Assad and the older brother of Bashar al-Assad. It was believed that Basil would replace Hafez until he died in the year 1994 in a car crash. He was buried with his father Hafez in their family's native village of Qardaha later that year. ==References== Category:1994 deaths Category:1962 births Category:Syrian generals Category:People from Damascus
title: Bassel al-Assad
